headline: Democrats Press for Details on Threats Cited by Trump
abstract: Administration officials argue that the general was plotting imminent attacks, but Democrats said that the intelligence they have seen was too vague.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” Under increasing pressure to defend the killing of a top Iranian general in Iraq, senior Trump administration officials offered new justifications but little detail on Tuesday, citing threats to the American Embassy in Baghdad and intelligence suggesting other imminent attacks that helped prompt the strike.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
